name: Robots Express
description:
This game is our submission for the MiniJam 13 !

In this game, you are the old Mc Jhons, a wanted criminal, and you are going to assault a train containing the most high tech in the whole state, and you'll be rich if you manage to take control of the train. But as soon as you hop on the train, you are engaged by it's security systems. It look's like you weren't aware of the king of robot you were about to encounter.

Controls

- Q & D = Move

- K = Jump

- L = Shoot

Thanks for playing our game !
